nodes.text: Sassi was a female human waitress at Plop Dribble's on Stobar during the Clone Wars. During this time, the Dathomirian Zabrak Savage Opress arrived at the restaurant, and began to choke Sassi. Loubo, the owner of the restaurant, told the droid Marwigo to contact the authorities, however Opress had already left. The authorities, as well as Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and Padawan Ahsoka Tano, arrived and aided Sassi in returning to her feet.
